sqlMap.select:
select log_id,oper_model,oper_user,oper_note,oper_time,ip from vs_admin_log where 1=1
and oper_model = #oper_model#
and oper_user = #operUser#
and ip = #ip#
and (oper_model like concat('%', #keywords#, '%') or oper_user like concat('%', #keywords#, '%') or oper_note like concat('%', #keywords#, '%') or ip like concat('%', #keywords#, '%') )
ORDER BY log_id
limit #start#,#end#
sqlMap.insert: insert into vs_admin_log(log_id,oper_model,oper_user,oper_note,oper_time,ip) values ((select ifnull(max(vsal.log_id)+1,1) from vs_admin_log vsal),#operModel#,#operUser#,#operNote#,#operTime#,#ip#)
